import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; // import jwt from 'jsonwebtoken'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Header = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); // Declare this variable // Get the JWT token from local storage // const token = localStorage.getItem('auth-token'); // const localEmployeeID = localStorage.getItem('employeeID'); // const localPremission = localStorage.getItem('premission'); const [isLoggedIn, setIsLoggedIn] = useState(false); const [premission, setPremission] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { // Check if the user is logged in const token = localStorage.getItem('auth-token'); setIsLoggedIn(!!token); // Fetch the user's premission const userPremission = localStorage.getItem('premission'); setPremission(userPremission); }, []); return (
